articles.author: Jacob Ranson
articles.title: England's Euro 2022 heroes send open letter to Rishi Sunak and Liz Truss - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Lionesses sealed a 2-1 victory over Germany after extra-time thanks to goals from Ella Toone and Chloe Kelly to win their first major trophy in front of 87,192 fans at Wembley Stadium on Sunday.
articles.content: Rishi Sunak and Liz Truss have pledged action after receiving a powerful open letter from England's Lionesses demanding more football lessons for girls at school, following their stunning Euro 2022 v… [+7404 chars]
